      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String address,
           int commandPort,
           int objectPort)
             throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                    java.io.IOException
        Opens connections (command and object) to a slave
        Parameters:
        address - network address of the slave
        commandPort - the port for sending commands
        objectPort - the port for sending objects
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException
        java.io.IOException

      • close

        public boolean close()
        Closes both command and object connections
        Returns:
        true if both are closed, false otherwise

      • getSlave

        public Slave getSlave()
        Returns the associated slave
        Returns:
        a slave

      • setSlave

        public void setSlave(Slave slave)
        Modifies the associated slave. If the concerned slave has no reference to this instance, reference is made.
        Parameters:
        slave - a slave

      • getLastResponsePack

        public DataBuffer getLastResponsePack()

      • send

        public boolean send(AbstractTest test,
           java.lang.String protocolName)
        Sends a test to the connected slave
        Parameters:
        test - a test to send
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise

      • stop

        public boolean stop()
        Sends a Stop message to stop the test processing into the slave
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise

      • run

        public boolean run(java.lang.String address,
          int port)
        Sends a run command to start the test scenario
        Parameters:
        address - the address of the tested server
        port - the port of the tested protocol
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise

      • result

        public boolean result()
        Get test responses from server. Use getLastPackageResponse();
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise
